quote: Your friend mourns your losses with you, because they experience them too. The truth is, no matter how lonely you might feel, you're never going through anything alone....you can choose your family.
quote_letters: YOUR FRIEND MOURNS YOUR LOSSES WITH YOU BECAUSE THEY EXPERIENCE THEM TOO THE TRUTH IS NO MATTER HOW LONELY YOU MIGHT FEEL YOURE NEVER GOING THROUGH ANYTHING ALONEYOU CAN CHOOSE YOUR FAMILY
